Step 1: Enable GPS Location and Automatic Time Zone
 Step 2: Connect to CHD7_WiFi
 Step 3: Tap the Fingerprint Icon
 Step 4: Take a selfie and press OK\ nStep 5: You successfully time in/out
 Step 6: Tap upload icon to sync it to the server


 NOTE: It is advisable to upload only when you have IN and OUT because only the device remembers the IN/OUT status

Step 1: Tap the Add/Plus Icon
 Step 2: Select which type of leave you want
 Step 3: Specify the inclusive dates
 Step 4: Tap save
 Step 5: Tap upload icon to sync it to the server


 NOTE: Inclusive dates must have the same month e.g 07/25/2018 - 07/31/2018

Step 1: Tap the Add/Plus Icon
 Step 2: Input SO #
 Step 3: Specify the inclusive dates
 Step 4: Tap save
 Step 5: Tap upload icon to sync it to the server


 NOTE: Inclusive dates must have the same month e.g 07/25/2018 - 07/31/2018
